txt.en: 'Thank you for passing along Haelam's message. A shame that I've had to hear from him so soon since our last correspondence, but I do hope that he is trying to be less... unpleasant.\n\n'At the very least, I will continue to ensure anyone working for him is well-compensated.'

'Hey! You there! -- I mean, excuse me, brave [placeholder]. Will you be heading into Belfalas?

'Due to the lumber camp situation in Ringl√≥ Vale, multiple shipments have been delayed. Bruidis in Tadrent needs to be notified. Send this list to her... please.' 

The last word barely makes it past the man's gritted teeth.
The merchant Haelam has a message for you to deliver.
Haelam has asked you to bring a list of delayed lumber orders to Bruidis.\n\nShe can be found in Tadrent, south-west from Calembel.
